sentences.sContent: There was no bombast or conceit in his speech.
sentences.sCn: 他的发言里没有浮夸或自负。

remMethod.val: bomb (爆炸) + ast (看作ask， 要求) → 爆炸式的要求 → 夸大的言辞

words.tran: 夸大地；浮华地；言过其实地；矫揉造作地

trans.tranOther: Bombast is trying to impress people by saying things that sound impressive but have little meaning
